agency_desc: A national, nonprofit organization that provides "free and confidential one-on-one support to cancer patients and/or their family members."
service_description: Provides support by matching cancer patients and family members with trained volunteers who have themselves undergone and recovered from a similar cancer experience. Volunteers may offer information for over 80 cancer types.
site_details: Call or visit website for information or to register.
site_eligibility: Adult cancer patients, families, and friends
